titleStmt.title: Whereas we are informed, that several collectors of the several pole-monies lately raised in this kingdome for His Majesties service, have not as yet accompted into the receipt of His Majesties Exchequer, for the monies so received by them, the names of which collectors are as followeth ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)

titleStmt.title: Whereas we are informed, that several collectors of the several pole-monies lately raised in this kingdome for His Majesties service, have not as yet accompted into the receipt of His Majesties Exchequer, for the monies so received by them, the names of which collectors are as followeth ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin, the fourth day of August, 1662"--leaf [2]
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
